```{r}
# How to tell if a large dataframe is incomplete? (hw4q4) 
# Generate incomplete data - data with a gap
x <- c(1:12345, 12445:20000)
class(x)
hist(x) # the little gap in histogram implies incomplete
d <- diff(x) # find gap between row values
table(d) # table is like count-distinct
# 1 100
# 19899 1
which.max(d)
d[12340:12350]
x[12340:12350]
```
